description: The apparent leader of the Baka Trio, Bacchi-Guu is an overweight, bespectacled pervert who has no shame. The arrival of beautiful girls to Kanenone seems to send him out of control. He does things such as drinking the bath water the girls recently bathed in, to making a nipple print of his own nipples so he can imagine they belong to a girl.
name: Ijuuin Tadatomo
